page.title: 14Sport
page.content: At Chartridge School we have quite good sports equipment and get involved in many leagues, such as football and netball through the school.We also have a Table-tennis league for boys and girls. We have a large sports field.At the end of the summer term we have a sports day.In Chesham there are quite a few sports schemes recently new tennis courts,new 5 aside football and basketball pitches have been made. At Chartridge most boys prefer football as thier best sport and most girls like table tennis.17 out of 34 people in our class belong to an association to do with sport.Chesham United F.C. burnt down and has just been rebuilt.Also England football teams have been banned from European tournaments by U.E.F.A. and F.I.F.A..
